name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--james-rocha;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (James Rocha)

testSteps.description: Given that James Rocha gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: James Rocha visits the conference page
James Rocha opens the browser at "/"
James Rocha maximises the browser window
James Rocha wants to register
James Rocha clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 4 regular tickets for the talks

children.description: James Rocha buys a quantity of 4 regular tickets for the talks
James Rocha buys a quantity of 4 tickets of type regular
James Rocha clicks on the Talks tab
James Rocha enters 4 into the Number of Regular Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 4 tickets for the workshop Workshop C

children.description: James Rocha buys a quantity of 4 for the workshop Workshop C
James Rocha buys a quantity of 4 tickets of type Workshop C
James Rocha clicks on the Workshops tab
James Rocha enters 4 into the Number of Workshop C Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: James Rocha, chambersCarroll, chamberscarroll@oronoko.com, 03/02/1984, FARMEX, 552 Woodruff Avenue - Malott - Virginia - 2473, Adelino, 34483, Belgium

children.description: James Rocha fills the registration form with his James Rocha, chambersCarroll, chamberscarroll@oronoko.com, 03/02/1984, FARMEX, 552 Woodruff Avenue - Malott - Virginia - 2473, Adelino, 34483, Belgium
James Rocha scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
James Rocha clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
James Rocha enters James Rocha into the Actor's Fullname
James Rocha enters chambersCarroll into the Actor's Nickname
James Rocha enters chamberscarroll@oronoko.com into the Actor's Email
James Rocha picks the date 3/2/1984 on the Actor's Date of Birth
James Rocha enters FARMEX into the Actor's Company
James Rocha enters 552 Woodruff Avenue - Malott - Virginia - 2473 into the Actor's Address
James Rocha enters Adelino into the Actor's City
James Rocha enters 34483 into the Actor's Zip
James Rocha selects "Belgium" from the Actor's Country
James Rocha clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: James Rocha checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
